name: Scribblenauts Unmasked: A DC Comics Adventure
synopsis: Join Maxwell as he unites with Batman™, Superman™ and the rest of The Justice League™ to restore order to the DC Comics universe! Challenge your imagination as you battle the mightiest villains through an exciting, action-flled adventure. Then enjoy endless replayability with all-new, dynamic puzzles that feature a different take on the mission depending on your location.
